mapper.insert: insert into easybuy_order(userId, loginName, userAddress, createTime, serialNumber) value (#{userId}, #{loginName}, #{userAddress}, now(), #{serialNumber})
mapper.update: update easybuy_order set status = 2 where isDelete = 0 and id = #{id}

select o.id, userId, loginName, userAddress, o.createTime, cost, serialNumber, status, name statusName from easybuy_order o, easybuy_order_type t where o.isDelete = 0 and o.status = t.id
and serialNumber like concat('%', #{serialNumber}, '%')
and loginName like concat('%', #{loginName}, '%')

select count(1) from easybuy_order o, easybuy_order_type t where o.isDelete = 0 and o.status = t.id and userId = #{userId}
and serialNumber like concat('%', #{serialNumber}, '%')
select id, userId, loginName, userAddress, createTime, cost, serialNumber, status from easybuy_order where isDelete = 0 and status = 0 and date_sub(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) > createTime;
